title: 3. A Different Page with Josie Layton and Jessica Sanders: Love Your Body
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary: Jessica is a social worker, advocate, educator and the award-winning author of Love Your Body, Be Your Own Man and Me Time! A brilliant and passionate voice of body positivity for young girls everywhere, Jessica wrote Love Your Body to educate and empower young girls with the message of self-love. It is her mission to make every young person remember that they are wonderful, exactly as they are.

description: Jessica is a social worker, advocate, educator and the award-winning author of Love Your Body, Be Your Own Man and Me Time! A brilliant and passionate voice of body positivity for young girls everywhere, Jessica wrote Love Your Body to educate and empower young girls with the message of self-love. It is her mission to make every young person remember that they are wonderful, exactly as they are.
